data.title: A great time!
data.text: We went Escape Modesto and did the Prison Break Room for a birthday.  The experience is well organized.  The clues and puzzles were difficult but not overly so.  Lots of different things to decipher to try to escape before time ran out.  The staff was great.  They explained things well, and have a good sense of timing in knowing when to ask if you need a hint. We definitely want to go back and try the different rooms!  I recommend it for a team building experience; a different kind of party experience; or just get a group together to have some fun!

data.title: Team Building Event
data.text: We took our entire work team and everyone had a fabulous time! Neither team was able to escape, which just means we will be back to try the next room!

data.title: Unique Fun Experience!
data.text:
My friends and I decided to come to the escape room for my birthday! There were 10 of us and we did king Tuts Treasure.  Having never done an escape room before we were very excited! The personnel that run the escape room are very professional and extremely helpful. They explained all the rules gave us some tips and then "locked" us in the room. 

 You definitely have to work together and communicate as there are clues all over the room. It's such a unique and fun experience… You have to at least try it once. But I think we will be trying it twice… Because we enjoyed it so much we would like to come back and try another room.

It's such a unique and fun experience… You have to at least try it once. But I think we will be trying it twice… Because we enjoyed it so much we would like to come back and try another room. 

 This room would also be great for kids and families and friends. All age groups are welcome. It's fun to work together and try to solve a puzzle! 

PS  we did the escape room in costume… Which I really think adds to the experience!

data.title: Couldn't believe we failed!
data.text: This was such a fun thing to do! We had 7 adults (4 in our group, plus 3 from another group) and we were all quite certain we would escape, however, we didn't!!! We got extremely close, but ran out of time! We tried King's Tut Treasure room, it was very well thought out and put together. This is a very fun thing to do before dinner & drinks or even after dinner & drinks!!!  Great party idea!! Can't wait to go back and try the Prison Break room (which is supposed to be even more difficult!!!)

data.title: Escape!
data.text: We had a great time trying to figure out the clues and solve puzzles to escape.  Very well thought out. Can't wait to go back and try the other room!
